body_html:
Could you please clarify what you mean by 'download source from github description “Installation”'? Are you downloading using the links in the README.md on this page ?

If so, then please note that the link on that page to stable binary releases is currently down, so is it possible that you are using the links under "People who are a little more adventurous can also try our nightly binaries:" ? These are from a live repo and so not guaranteed to be bug free!

Could you please try following the instructions on this page: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux

body:
Could you please clarify what you mean by 'download source from github description “Installation”'?  Are you downloading using the links in the README.md on [this](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow) page ?  

If so, then please note that the link on that page to **stable** binary releases is currently down, so is it possible that you are using the links under "People who are a little more adventurous can also try our nightly binaries:" ?   These are from a live repo and so not guaranteed to be bug free!

Could you please try following the instructions on this page: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux
